text: All the lists in the old system will exist in the new system at a different id :sad-panda: so what you're seeing is expected

The `/crm/v3/lists` endpoint is expecting an array of query params `&listIds=1&listIds=2` and returning those specific lists back to you, so you're giving us an empty array and we give you back an empty array
The old `listType` field is the new `processingType` field
